page.title: 09Mole Valley Farmers.
page.content: We found out that when this company started 8 years ago it only had 5 workers but now it has expanded to 20 employees. The company gets it's stock from all over the world. Two hundred years ago on the same site there was a mill called Pen Mill after that the name was changed to Chugley Mill. The area they supply covers a 30 mile radius. They are not that well known in Britain because they are based in the West Country.In the area they supply 13 thousand members. They are open 266 days a year. The area of the building covers 3 acres and it has grown quite alot over the last 2 years. The things they sell covers a wide range from agricultural equipment,clothes,tools,seeds,garden equipment and other things as well.
